TopicTitle: Realsim Overhaul : career mode all level 1 tech tree unlocked. Can i dock ?

Articles.Content: I have a cereer mode. All my lvl 1 science is unlocked. I wonder if i can dock and which parts i need. The first pic shows i need the agena vehicle. But i dont have this unless im wrong. Anyone can help me ? Or i just need to get lvl 2 Tech to unlock the missing parts.
No, you cannot dock. Level 1 would be what, Orbital Rocketry, Stability, and Survivability, yeah? Do you recall Mercury or Vostok docking? :]
